actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide tax relief to small businesses by establishing a graduated income tax rate for corporations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code by providing graduated corporate income tax rates ranging, over seven brackets, from a 16 percent rate on a corporation's first $25,000 income to a 45 percent rate on income over $150,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide tax relief to small businesses by establishing a graduated income tax rate for corporations.
